lines.text:
[When her son rides off with Plack's daughter on his new motorcycle]
We shall never see them alive again. They'll be brought home in an ambulance.
Well they needn't expect to see me at the funeral!
I ain't goin' down by the lane - I'm goin' to take a short cut 'cross the castle grounds.
Oh-ho - 'tis full moon tonight George. Look out the Black Monk don't get you.
To Hell with the Black Monk!
That's right. 'Tis supposed to be Old Nick hisself - so the story goes...
